description.zh-cn: 中国军事人物，张作孚之子，张作霖之侄，张学良的堂弟。曾于奉天讲武堂和日本陆军大学学习。初在奉系军队任职，后投靠石友三，中原大战失败后又在九一八事变后投靠日军，被任命为东北自卫军总司令，最终因其投靠日本的国仇家恨而被张学良下令剿杀。
description.en: A Chinese military figure, son of Zhang Zuofu, nephew of Zhang Zuolin, and cousin of Zhang Xueliang. He studied at the Fengtian Military Academy and the Imperial Japanese Army Academy. He initially served in the Fengtian clique army, later defected to Shi Yousan, and after the defeat in the Central Plains War, he defected to the Japanese army after the Mukden Incident. He was appointed Commander-in-Chief of the Northeast Self-Defense Army and was eventually killed on Zhang Xueliang's orders due to his collaboration with the Japanese, which was seen as a national betrayal.

description.zh-cn: 中国军事及政治人物，张作霖之子，张学成的堂兄。曾与张学成一同就读于奉天讲武堂。因张学成投靠日本而下令将其剿杀。
description.en: A Chinese military and political figure, son of Zhang Zuolin and cousin of Zhang Xuecheng. He attended the Fengtian Military Academy alongside Zhang Xuecheng. He ordered the killing of Zhang Xuecheng for his collaboration with the Japanese.

description.zh-cn: 奉系军阀首领，张学良之父，张作孚之兄。他抚养了侄子张学成并提拔其在军中担任团长、旅长等职务。在皇姑屯事件中被日军刺杀身亡。
description.en: Leader of the Fengtian clique, father of Zhang Xueliang, and elder brother of Zhang Zuofu. He raised his nephew Zhang Xuecheng and promoted him to positions such as regiment commander and brigade commander in his army. He was assassinated by the Japanese army in the Huanggutun Incident.

description.zh-cn: 张作霖的二哥，张学成与张学文之父，在战斗中阵亡。
description.en: The second elder brother of Zhang Zuolin and the father of Zhang Xuecheng and Zhang Xuewen. He was killed in action.

description.zh-cn: 位于奉天（今沈阳）的军事院校，张学成与张学良曾于1919年同期在此就读。
description.en: A military academy located in Fengtian (modern-day Shenyang). Zhang Xuecheng and Zhang Xueliang were classmates there in 1919.

description.zh-cn: 张作孚之子，张学成之弟。曾与张学成一同被送往日本陆军大学留学。
description.en: Son of Zhang Zuofu and younger brother of Zhang Xuecheng. He was sent to study at the Imperial Japanese Army Academy along with Zhang Xuecheng.

description.zh-cn: 日本的军事院校，张学成和张学文曾在此留学深造。
description.en: A military academy in Japan where Zhang Xuecheng and Zhang Xuewen studied.

description.zh-cn: 1928年，日本关东军在沈阳皇姑屯策划的针对奉系军阀首领张作霖的暗杀事件。
description.en: In 1928, the Japanese Kwantung Army planned and executed the assassination of Fengtian clique leader Zhang Zuolin in Huanggutun, Shenyang.

description.zh-cn: 大日本帝国的武装力量。在皇姑屯事件中刺杀了张作霖，并发动了九一八事变侵略奉天。张学成在事变后投靠该军队。
description.en: The armed forces of the Empire of Japan. They assassinated Zhang Zuolin in the Huanggutun Incident and launched the Mukden Incident to invade Fengtian. Zhang Xuecheng defected to this army after the incident.

description.zh-cn: 中华民国军事人物。张学成在张作霖死后曾投靠于他，后石友三在中原大战中失败。
description.en: A military figure of the Republic of China. Zhang Xuecheng joined him after Zhang Zuolin's death, but Shi Yousan was later defeated in the Central Plains War.

description.zh-cn: 1930年在中国发生的一场大规模军阀混战。石友三在此战中失败。
description.en: A large-scale civil war between warlords that took place in China in 1930. Shi Yousan was defeated in this war.

description.zh-cn: 中国城市。张学成在中原大战石友三部失败后逃至此地。
description.en: A city in China. Zhang Xuecheng fled here after Shi Yousan's forces were defeated in the Central Plains War.

description.zh-cn: 1931年9月，日军侵略中国东北的事件。此事变后，张学成从天津回到奉天投靠日军。
description.en: An event in September 1931 when the Japanese army invaded Northeast China. After this incident, Zhang Xuecheng returned from Tianjin to Fengtian and joined the Japanese forces.

description.zh-cn: 中国东北地区的城市，九一八事变发生地。
description.en: A city in Northeast China, the location of the Mukden Incident.

description.zh-cn: 由日军在九一八事变后扶植的武装力量，张学成被任命为总司令。
description.en: An armed force supported by the Japanese army after the Mukden Incident, with Zhang Xuecheng appointed as its Commander-in-Chief.

description.zh-cn: 辽宁公安骑兵将领，奉张学良之令，率部击毙张学成。
description.en: A commander in the Liaoning Public Security Cavalry who, under Zhang Xueliang's orders, led his troops to kill Zhang Xuecheng.

description.zh-cn: 辽宁公安骑兵将领，奉张学良之令，率部击毙张学成。
description.en: A commander in the Liaoning Public Security Cavalry who, under Zhang Xueliang's orders, led his troops to kill Zhang Xuecheng.

description.zh-cn: 中国辽宁省的城市，张学成在此地附近被击毙。
description.en: A city in Liaoning Province, China, near where Zhang Xuecheng was killed.

description.zh-cn: 在张学良命令下，由熊正平、米春霖率领并击毙张学成的部队。
description.en: The unit, led by Xiong Zhengping and Mi Chunlin, that killed Zhang Xuecheng under the orders of Zhang Xueliang.

description.zh-cn: 张学成是张作孚的儿子。
description.en: Zhang Xuecheng is the son of Zhang Zuofu.

description.zh-cn: 张作孚是张作霖的二哥。
description.en: Zhang Zuofu was Zhang Zuolin's second elder brother.

description.zh-cn: 张作霖在其兄张作孚阵亡后，将侄子张学成抚养成人，并提拔他担任团长、旅长等职务。
description.en: After his brother Zhang Zuofu was killed in action, Zhang Zuolin raised his nephew Zhang Xuecheng and promoted him to positions such as regiment commander and brigade commander.

description.zh-cn: 张学成是张学良的堂弟。
description.en: Zhang Xuecheng was Zhang Xueliang's paternal cousin.

description.zh-cn: 张学成是张学文的哥哥。
description.en: Zhang Xuecheng was Zhang Xuewen's elder brother.

description.zh-cn: 1919年，张学成就读于奉天讲武堂第一期。
description.en: In 1919, Zhang Xuecheng was enrolled in the first class of the Fengtian Military Academy.

description.zh-cn: 1919年，张学良与张学成同期就读于奉天讲武堂第一期。
description.en: In 1919, Zhang Xueliang was enrolled in the first class of the Fengtian Military Academy at the same time as Zhang Xuecheng.

description.zh-cn: 张学成毕业于奉天讲武堂后，被张作霖送到日本陆军大学留学深造。
description.en: After graduating from the Fengtian Military Academy, Zhang Xuecheng was sent by Zhang Zuolin to study at the Imperial Japanese Army Academy.

description.zh-cn: 张学文与其兄张学成一同被张作霖送到日本陆军大学留学深造。
description.en: Zhang Xuewen was sent by Zhang Zuolin to study at the Imperial Japanese Army Academy along with his elder brother Zhang Xuecheng.

description.zh-cn: 1928年，日军在皇姑屯事件中刺杀了张作霖。
description.en: In 1928, the Japanese army assassinated Zhang Zuolin in the Huanggutun Incident.

description.zh-cn: 1928年张作霖被刺杀后，张学成投靠石友三。
description.en: After Zhang Zuolin was assassinated in 1928, Zhang Xuecheng joined Shi Yousan.

description.zh-cn: 石友三的部队在中原大战中失败。
description.en: Shi Yousan's forces were defeated in the Central Plains War.

description.zh-cn: 九一八事变发生后，张学成从天津回到奉天并投靠日军。
description.en: After the Mukden Incident occurred, Zhang Xuecheng returned from Tianjin to Fengtian and defected to the Japanese army.

description.zh-cn: 1931年9月奉天事变后，张学成投靠日军。
description.en: After the Mukden Incident in September 1931, Zhang Xuecheng defected to the Japanese army.

description.zh-cn: 张学成投靠日军后，被任命为东北自卫军总司令。
description.en: After defecting to the Japanese army, Zhang Xuecheng was appointed Commander-in-Chief of the Northeast Self-Defense Army.

description.zh-cn: 张学成被日军任命为东北自卫军总司令。
description.en: Zhang Xuecheng was appointed by the Japanese army as the Commander-in-Chief of the Northeast Self-Defense Army.

description.zh-cn: 因张学成投靠日本，张学良恨其不顾国仇家恨，下令将其剿杀。
description.en: Because Zhang Xuecheng defected to Japan, Zhang Xueliang, hating him for disregarding national enmity, ordered his assassination.

description.zh-cn: 在张学良的命令下，辽宁公安骑兵部队击毙了张学成。
description.en: Under the orders of Zhang Xueliang, the Liaoning Public Security Cavalry unit killed Zhang Xuecheng.

description.zh-cn: 熊正平率领其辽宁公安骑兵部队击毙了张学成。
description.en: Xiong Zhengping led his Liaoning Public Security Cavalry unit and killed Zhang Xuecheng.

description.zh-cn: 米春霖率领其辽宁公安骑兵部队击毙了张学成。
description.en: Mi Chunlin led his Liaoning Public Security Cavalry unit and killed Zhang Xuecheng.
